item.description:
Let's celebrate spring with our fifth monthly meetup, and our third at our new official space: The Trident Cafe on Newbury Street.

Please note that Meetup has begun charging $9 a month for group membership. As the organizer, I pay this fee and am supposed to collect donations from the group. I'm asking for a $2 donation from those who attend the meetups; this is voluntary, so if you can't pay it, don't worry.

The closet T stop to the Trident is Hynes/Mass Ave on the Green Line. All lines except the E (outbound) go to this stop; all inbound lines pass it.

Parking can be difficult but not impossible to find on Newbury Street. There are also some garages close by.

Remember to bring business cards and enough money to order food!

For more information, see http://www.tridentboo...

group.name: The Boston Graphic Design Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Graphic Design May Meetup
